documents.document: @wuzzydude clubs can have more than 3 players on loan, only no more than 3 from the same club
For Braga their season is on the rocks as Simão has struggled somewhat since taking over. Lost in Minho derby, #TacaCTT final & last night
Makaridze's heroics in goal continued with a penalty save from Fabinho, but the Feirense midfielder recovered to score the equaliser
#TacaCTT winners Moreirense back down to earth somewhat as a spirited Feirense, so much better under Nuno Manta, grabbed a deserved point
Two matches in #LigaNOS last night, Moreirense held 1-1 at home to Feirense, while Braga's woes continued with a 1-0 reverse at Rio Ave
@wuzzydude Can only have 3 loan players max at one time but Belenenes only have 2 from Sporting right now
@wuzzydude I think that was a concern at one stage but I believe the main reason was simply he wasn't fit enough, so they looked elsewhere
.@FCPorto have added 17 year old @DalotDiogo to their #UCL squad for the knockouts vs Juventus. The full-back has huge potential!
Good signing, should give them some much-needed power from the back of the court https://t.co/xE9qPbD2jr
@_Cesinando Yeah hearing they might have to go back down to B team which would be a shame. Both players losing out in this scenario it seems
André Geraldes & Ryan Gauld will be in Sporting's options for the rest of the season, having been in limbo for the… https://t.co/SD1Yd9NRho
Chaves, without Assis & Freire, were very poor. In context, only their 4th defeat of the season, the other 3 being vs Benfica, Porto & Braga
FT, a vital & thoroughly deserved win for Tondela as they beat Chaves 2-0 in the early KO. Osorio & Heliardo with the goals. #LigaNOS
Last change for Tondela now, and a really good debut for Heliardo comes to an end. He is replaced by Murilo. #LigaNOS
Chaves respond with a big chance of their own but Fall blazes over when well-placed. 8' to go with Tondela still 2-0 up. #LigaNOS
Tondela so close to a 3rd, good skill from Jailson and his shot beats Ricardo Nunes, but Nuno Andre Coelho blocks on the line. #LigaNOS
Final sub for Chaves as Simon Vukcevic replaces Perdigao. 19' to go now. #LigaNOS
Into the 2nd half & still not flowing for Chaves. They make a change as Patrão subbed off & on comes Pedro Tiba for his debut #LigaNOS
@dangouv Haha it seems so! The wheeling & dealing looks promising so far, I'm not going to write off Tondela after what happened last year!
HT, a disrupted half due to injuries but Tondela lead Chaves 2-0, thanks to goals from new boys Osorio & Heliardo. #LigaNOS
GOLO!! Another debut goal for Tondela, as Heliardo taps into an empty net for 2-0. Just before HT too. #LigaNOS
Now a good chance for Heliardo, but his free header is straight at Ricardo Nunes. Following the theme of the half he has hurt himself too
Another injury in this first half, this time for Chaves as Rafa is forced off. Fall is on, 10' till the break, Tondela still 1-0 up #LigaNOS
What a chance for Rafa to level the scores immediately, another corner causing havoc but his point-blank header flies just wide. #LigaNOS
GOLO! Injury-hit but Tondela have taken the lead! Corner is swung in & Osorio notches on his full debut! #LigaNOS
More bad luck with injury for Tondela, as they are forced into a 2nd substitution after only 18', Monteiro stretchered off. Tavares on.
Now a decent chance for Tondela, but Pedro Nuno fires over the bar from inside the area. Competitive start in Viseu. #LigaNOS
Also a debut for Nuno Andre Coelho in the heart of the Chaves defence, replacing the Japan-bound Freire. #LigaNOS
1st starts for 2 Tondela signings also, as Osorio & Heliardo make the XI. Early blow here though as Wagner off inured, Cardoso repaces him.
Chaves almost off the mark early too as Perdigao plays in Rafa, but Claudio Ramos is quickly off his line to thwart him. #LigaNOS
The morning game in #LigaNOS is underway, Tondela hosting in-form Chaves, who have handed Bressan a first start for the club
FT, an excellent win for Belenenses as they end Boavista's good run. Joao Diogo with the only goal of the game. #LigaNOS
Belenenses survive a goalmouth scramble that ends in Mbala slicing wide. They now make a 2nd change, Sousa on for Yebda. #LigaNOS
Excellent save from Cristiano keeps Belenenses in front, reacting well on the goal-line. 9' to go now. #LigaNOS
Final change for Boavista, giant striker Idé is on for the ineffective Schembri. #LigaNOS
First change for Belenenses now as Oriol Rosell is on, replacing Juanto. They still lead Boavista 1-0, 18' to go. #LigaNOS
Another change for the home side, as Makhmudov is on for Anderson Carvalho. Boavista really missing Iuri Medeiros here. #LigaNOS
Boavista have responded with a substitution, Mbala, another deubtant, replacing Bukia. #LigaNOS
GOLO! Finally something of note, Abel Camara's effort forces a save out of Vagner but Diogo hammers in the rebound, 1-0 Belenenses.
Boavista vs Belenenses coming up in #LigaNOS - a couple of debuts here, Vagner starts for the hosts, first game of Edgar Ié for Belenenses
Check out the @FootballRadar 2016 team of the year. Read about the #LigaNOS star who makes our XI: https://t.co/G98Oog65ud
OH BALLACK https://t.co/sm0mByeRV5
Chaves a victim of their own success, Assis becomes the latest star asset to join Braga, following Battaglia, Pauli… https://t.co/M14NwkFn3v
#LigaNOS goalkeepers will get plenty of ideas from this https://t.co/MiFjMfYi1l
Chaves are an impressive outfit, they've held a good spirit together despite losing their manager & 2 of their best players this season
Ambulance on the pitch to aid him, let's hope it is not too serious. A worrying sight.
Distressing scenes, particularly after what occurred at the weekend, as Nacional's Hamzaoui looks to have sustained a very bad head injury
And bosh, Davidson doubles Chaves' lead! Works his way into the penalty area and pokes an effort past Rui Silva for 2-0! #LigaNOS
Early days yet but also Davidson is looking to be a shrewd acquisition for Chaves. Has great close control & versatility around the front 3
Bruno Braga having an excellent game for Chaves, has scored the opening goal against Nacional & has come close to doing so again. #LigaNOS
Good news for Benfica fans as two of their best players this season renew their contracts, Pizzi & Ederson have bee… https://t.co/D1ltXo5yc4
.@FCPorto sign striker Tiquinho Soares, who has had an excellent season with @VitoriaSC1922 so far. https://t.co/Uqz4WiB8Qu
Sporting announce the termination of Markovic's loan deal. A talented player but his career just seems to have stal… https://t.co/CINzlfwC3U
FT, a great 2-1 win for Boavista away at Arouca, Iuri Medeiros scoring the winner. Propels them up to 8th in #LigaNOS, unbeaten in 5.
@CarlosJ_Santos that said, the ref has just added 6 minutes here so I think he has seen through the act more than others!
@CarlosJ_Santos definitely. And that's the reason the players keep doing this tactic, they know it will work! Very frustrating!
@CarlosJ_Santos Haha, so ridiculous! How they can keep doing it and getting away with it is beyond me.
Wow, another candidate for the worst for anti-jogo, Mickael Meira. 3 times he's needed "treatment" now. #LigaNOS
Iuri Medeiros getting better and better, he has struck for a 2nd successive game to give Boavista a 2-1 lead, over his old loan side Arouca
No league has more fragile goalkeepers. Every single week, countless examples. #LigaNOS
And now Arouca manager Lito Vidigal sent to the stands after only 12 mins! Is that a record? #LigaNOS
Great response from Boavista though as they are level after 11'! A crashing header from the skipper Idris crosses the line, 1-1. #LigaNOS
GOLO! Early lead for Arouca as Tomane scores his first for the club. Boavista caught cold. #LigaNOS
GOLO! Maritimo back in front! Raul with notches for the Madeira side. Set piece deliveries to headed goals is the order of the day! #LigaNOS
GOLO! Sporting are level, the #LigaNOS top scorer strikes again, a powerful header from Bas Dost!
It goes from bad to worse for Sporting, 1-0 down after 7' minutes away at Maritimo. Plenty of time to turn the match around though. #LigaNOS
FT, 4 headed goals (Felipe, Marcano, Danilo, Rui Pedro) is enough for Porto to see off a spirited Rio Ave side. It finishes 4-2. #LigaNOS
Four headed goals for Porto today. A vital 3 points to close the gap to Benfica. #LigaNOS
...But Porto wrap it up now, great work from Teixeira & he finds fellow sub Rui Pedro, who buries the diving header! 4-2 Porto. #LigaNOS
Rio Ave are still pushing here and go close to an equaliser, Marcelo's half volley flies narrowly over the bar. 3' to go. #LigaNOS
Ronan will replace Heldon for Rio Ave for the last 12'. They still trail Porto 3-2. #LigaNOS
Frantic pace to the game in this 2nd half. Rio Ave make another change, bringing on Krovinovic for Ruben Ribeiro. 25' left. #LigaNOS
GOLO! Another goal, and it's Danilo this time to make it 3-2! Yet another great delivery from Alex Telles. #LigaNOS
Layun promptly taken off and replaced by youngster Rui Pedro. Still 40' to go, Porto 2-2 Rio Ave. #LigaNOS
GOLO! Porto level it up, Marcano scores for the 2nd game running! Another great delivery from Telles & the Spaniard buries it past Cassio
Layun walking a very fine line, on a yellow already & has since conceded a penalty & taken down Guedes. Looks understandably rusty. #LigaNOS
GOLO! Rio Ave now take the lead! Roderick sends Casillas the wrong way from the spot after Layun fouled Gil Dias. #LigaDOS
André André on for Porto at the start of the 2nd half, replacing Corona, who has picked up a knock. #LigaNOS
HT, Porto were in control thanks to Felipe's early headed goal but a Casillas error allowed Guedes to equalise for Rio Ave. #LigaNOS
Casillas has been in great form this season but drops a clanger there. 9' till HT. #LigaNOS
GOLO! Against the run of play, Rio Ave equalise! Guedes is there to tap in after an awkward cross is fumbled by Casillas! #LigaNOS
Big chance for 2-0 as Diogo Jota is through 1v1 but he rattles the bar. #LigaNOS
Pedrinho was back from injury for Rio Ave but has suffered a relapse here. Bruno Teles replaces him for his debut. #LigaNOS
GOLO! A slow start to the game but Porto now take the lead. Alex Telles with the FK delivery and a simple header for Felipe, 1-0. #LigaNOS
Rio Ave looking to respond to last week's defeat to Belenenses. Coach Luis Castro returning to his former club. #LigaNOS
Miguel Layun is back for Porto, replacing the injured Maxi Pereira. #LigaNOS
Porto vs Rio Ave in the 1st #LigaNOS match of the day. Should be a good contest, home side looking to close the gap at the top to 1 point
@PortuGoal1 @TiagoEstv @FootyML @FCPortoGlobal @leoeslions excellent read, good work guys
@GDChavesWorld @RodriBattaglia @Record_Portugal well deserved, he has been excellent all season!
GOLO! Finally a goal and Chaves have struck late, they lead Sporting with 3' to go thanks to a powerful header from Carlos Ponck.
Or at least will do when the game resumes, ref blows for HT. Still 0-0 in the #TacadePortugal quarter final between Chaves & Sporting.
More injury woe for #SportingCP as André is coming off with what looks like a bad injury, Joel Campbell replaces him. #TacadePortugal
Sporting close to the opener again, Coates heads narrowly wide from a corner, with Filipe looking rooted to the spot. #TacadePortugal
Bruno Cesar replaces him at left-back. 10' till HT, it remains Chaves 0-0 Sporting. #TacadePortugal
Rafa in behind for Chaves but Jefferson gets back with a good interception. Comes at a cost though, has pulled a muscle.
First chance for Sporting, clever run from Gelson and his shot is tipped behind well by Filipe. #TacadePortugal
And now another excellent save from Beto! From point blank range he keeps out Fabio Martins, again! Quite a personal duel developing.
Now he has a free kick effort but Beto can watch it go over the bar. #TacadePortugal
Fabio Martins scored a stunning goal at the weekend and he goes close again here, volleyed effort tipped wide well by Beto. #TacadePortugal
The pair played out a cracking 2-2 draw at the weekend in #LigaNOS, so hoping for some more goals and drama here.
